title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 94.1 - Borrowings for the purpose of repaying shareholders and depositors
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 94.1 - Borrowings for the purpose of repaying shareholders and depositors

State Regulations
A savings and loan association may borrow money for the
purpose of repaying shareholders and depositors, and pledge its assets as
security for the repayment thereof, in any amount. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
94.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
